item.description:
Here is another great wine tasting event from Boston Uncorked. The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM on Thursday February 16. It will sell out so purchase your tickets from Boston Uncorked.

Members from my Red Sox Natives and Cathy's Boston Wine groups will also be joining us.

Join Boston Uncorked for their Annual Kick Off Celebration at Aragosta Bar & Bistro in Boston's historic North End. Boston Uncorked will provide the wine, food and stunning harbor views...all we have to do is sit back and enjoy their Wines On The Wharf!

 Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance. To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com [url=http://www.bostonuncorked.com][/url]. Please do not call or contact any other source for tickets.

The Aragosta Bistro is located at 3 Battery Wharf with Google/Map address at 377 Commercial Street, Boston, 02109.

We had a great time at the Holiday party.

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby ay 6:45 PM or Inside after 7:00 PM
item.name: SOLD OUT Wines On The Wharf with Boston Uncorked at Aragosta Bistro
